Class BattlecryAsPlaySpellCardAction

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Notification
    public class BattlecryAsPlaySpellCardAction
extends PlaySpellCardAction
    Allows a battlecry to be encapsulated as a spell card.
